definitions.definition: One who places or arranges something.
( slang ) One who deals in stolen goods; a fence .
( gambling , in combination ) A horse , etc. that finishes in a particular place in a race .

main_definition: One who places or arranges something.
secondary_definitions: ( slang ) One who deals in stolen goods; a fence .
( gambling , in combination ) A horse , etc. that finishes in a particular place in a race .

definitions.definition: ( ethology , sheep , Australia , New Zealand ) A lamb whose mother has died and which has transferred its attachment to an object, such as a bush or rock, in the locality.

main_definition: ( ethology , sheep , Australia , New Zealand ) A lamb whose mother has died and which has transferred its attachment to an object, such as a bush or rock, in the locality.

definitions.definition: A place where the superficial detritus is washed for gold , etc.

main_definition: A place where the superficial detritus is washed for gold , etc.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any place holding treasures .
